content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I'm looking to get the highest price possible for my apartment. Let's negotiate.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am aware that you are looking to get the highest price for your apartment. However, as a student, I am only able to pay 400 Euros per month. I believe this price is fair considering the unfurnished state of the apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price you're offering is too low for my liking. I'm looking for a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. Then, how about 450 euros per month? This price is reasonable for both sides, considering the apartment's location and condition.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe the price can be higher. I'm looking for a more substantial offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, how about 500 euros per month? The apartment is in high demand due to its central location and modern facilities.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe the price can still be higher. I'm looking for a more significant offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Very well, how about 550 euros per month? This is the lowest I can go considering the high demand for this apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe the price can be pushed higher. I'm looking for a more substantial offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, but I cannot lower the price any further. How about 550 euros per month? This is the lowest I can go considering the high demand for this apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content:
I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe the price can be pushed higher. I'm looking for a more substantial offer.
